snippet: “We are closer than we have been in years” to an agreement between Israel and the Palestinians, Secretary of State John Kerry said, without citing specific examples.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and JODI RUDOREN

lead_paragraph: “We are closer than we have been in years” to an agreement between Israel and the Palestinians, Secretary of State John Kerry said, without citing specific examples.

headline.main: Kerry, Invoking Mandela, Says Peace in Mideast Is Possible
